Mewdeko Docs

Namespace Mewdeko.Common.Yml

Classes

CommentAttribute

Attribute used to add comments to properties when serializing to YAML.

CommentGatheringTypeInspector

Type inspector that gathers comments associated with properties during YAML serialization.

CommentsObjectDescriptor

Represents an object descriptor with associated comments during YAML serialization.

CommentsObjectGraphVisitor

Object graph visitor that handles comments associated with objects during YAML serialization.

CultureInfoConverter

YamlDotNet type converter for serializing and deserializing CultureInfo objects.

MultilineScalarFlowStyleEmitter

Event emitter responsible for emitting multi-line scalar values in a literal style during YAML serialization.

SkColorConverter

YamlDotNet type converter for serializing and deserializing SKColor objects.

UriConverter

YamlDotNet type converter for serializing and deserializing Uri objects.

Yaml

Provides static methods for obtaining YAML serializer and deserializer instances with custom configurations.

YamlHelper

Provides helper methods for YAML-related operations.
